entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
